name: Innsbruck Ski & City Network
description: The SKI plus CITY Pass is a ticket that connects skiing and snowboarding in 5 ski destinations. The four skiing areas in the Stubaital, above all the Stubai Glacier, the Glungezer in Tyrol’s Hall area, the Axamer Lizum, Patscherkofelbahn and the Kühtai in the Innsbruck area as well as the Hochoetz skiing area in the anterior Ötztal Valley - a total of 12 skiing areas, 265 km of ski slopes, and 49 km of ski mountaineering routes available from October to May on a skiing vacation with a single card.
